chart.title: Global phase-out of leaded petrol in road vehicles
chart.subtitle: All countries have banned the use of leaded petrol in road vehicles. Algeria was the final country to do so in 2021.
chart.note: The specific date of phase-out could not be found for some countries, but all countries have banned its use.
chart.citation: Collected by Our World in Data based on multiple sources
